description.english: Completed Wave 1 in endless mode with no guns.

displayName.english: You can't take it with you

description.english: Completed wave 20 in every level in endless mode.

description.tchinese: 在無盡模式中通過每一關的20波。

description.english: Finished each level in story mode without dying.

description.tchinese: 沒有死亡的情況下完成故事模式每一關。
